column1: The Sandyman Family was a family of Hobbits from Hobbiton. They operated the Old Mill.
The Sandyman family did not get along well with some of the other Hobbiton families
column2: especially the Gamgee Family. Gaffer Gamgee did not like Sandyman
column3: nor did his son Samwise Gamgee like millers son Ted Sandyman
column4: who collaborated with Lotho Sackville-Baggins and Saruman during the War of the Ring.
